front.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for Enterprise YANG Modules

abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) for Uniform Resource Namespace (URN) resources to uniquely identify enterprise YANG modules. This document defines a single top level "rdns" NID, while the management of Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) utilizing the top level "rdns" NID rely on the existing domain name registries and the registrants of the individual domain names.
